data.title: Board & Staff
data.meta_description: The Houston Symphony administrative staff is made up of 71 full-time professionals who work diligently to ensure all operations are run effectively.

An endowed fund can be permanently established within the Houston Symphony Society through a direct contribution or via a planned gift such as a bequest. The fund can be designated for general purposes or specific interests.

For more information, please contact: Christine Ann Stevens, Director of Major Gifts, at Christine.Stevens@HoustonSymphony.org or 713.337.8521.
